entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
